languages.text: {n}Вы проводите немало времени, пытаясь отыскать взаимосвязи между многочисленными рубильниками и бобинами на приборной доске и искаженными символами, всплывающими на неисправном экране. Наконец, выстроив логическую цепочку, у вас получается усмирить взбесившуюся систему и заставить ее исторгнуть инфокрипту.{/n}

{n}You spend a lot of time trying to establish a connection between the countless switches and reels on the control panel and the twisted symbols floating on the glitchy screen. At last you manage to complete the logical network, tame the rampaging system, and force it to disengage the data-crypt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы проводите немало времени, пытаясь отыскать взаимосвязи между многочисленными рубильниками и бобинами на приборной доске и искаженными символами, всплывающими на неисправном экране. Наконец, выстроив логическую цепочку, у вас получается усмирить взбесившуюся систему и заставить ее исторгнуть инфокрипту.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You spend a lot of time trying to establish a connection between the countless switches and reels on the control board and the twisted symbols floating on the glitchy screen. At last you manage to complete the logical chain, tame the rampaging system and force it to disengage the cybercrypt.{/n}

{n}You spend a lot of time trying to establish a connection between the countless switches and reels on the control board and the twisted symbols floating on the glitchy screen. At last you manage to complete the logical chain, tame the rampaging system and force it to disengage the cybercrypt.{/n}

{n}You spend a lot of time trying to establish a connection between the countless switches and reels on the control panel and the twisted symbols floating on the glitchy screen. At last you manage to complete the logical network, tame the rampaging system, and force it to disengage the cybercrypt.{/n}

{n}You spend a lot of time trying to establish a connection between the countless switches and reels on the control panel and the twisted symbols floating on the glitchy screen. At last you manage to complete the logical network, tame the rampaging system, and force it to disengage the cybercrypt.{/n}

{n}You spend a lot of time trying to establish a connection between the countless switches and reels on the control panel and the twisted symbols floating on the glitchy screen. At last you manage to complete the logical network, tame the rampaging system, and force it to disengage the data-crypt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你花了很多时间，试图将控制面板上无数的开关与转盘，与漂浮在故障屏幕上的扭曲符号建立联系。到了最后，你成功地完成了逻辑网络，驯服了凶暴的系统，并迫使它放开了数据密存器。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend a lot of time trying to establish a connection between the countless switches and reels on the control panel and the twisted symbols floating on the glitchy screen. At last you manage to complete the logical network, tame the rampaging system, and force it to disengage the data-crypt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你花了很多时间，试图将控制面板上无数的开关与转盘，与漂浮在故障屏幕上的扭曲符号建立联系。到了最后，你成功地完成了逻辑网络，驯服了凶暴的系统，并迫使它放开了数据密存器。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasas largo tiempo intentando establecer una relación entre el sinfín de interruptores y rodillos del panel de control y los símbolos retorcidos de la pantalla defectuosa. Al final, logras establecer una red de lógica, domar el sistema descontrolado y obligarlo a soltar la cripta de datos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend a lot of time trying to establish a connection between the countless switches and reels on the control panel and the twisted symbols floating on the glitchy screen. At last you manage to complete the logical network, tame the rampaging system, and force it to disengage the data-crypt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasas largo tiempo intentando establecer una relación entre el sinfín de interruptores y rodillos del panel de control y los símbolos retorcidos de la pantalla defectuosa. Al final, logras establecer una red de lógica, domar el sistema descontrolado y obligarlo a soltar la cripta de datos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}多くの時間を費やして、コントロールパネル上の無数のスイッチやリール、そして故障した画面に浮かぶ捩れたシンボル間の接続を確立しようと努める。ついに論理ネットワークを完成させ、暴走するシステムを飼いならし、データ・クリプトの強制解除に成功した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend a lot of time trying to establish a connection between the countless switches and reels on the control panel and the twisted symbols floating on the glitchy screen. At last you manage to complete the logical network, tame the rampaging system, and force it to disengage the data-crypt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}多くの時間を費やして、コントロールパネル上の無数のスイッチやリール、そして故障した画面に浮かぶ捩れたシンボル間の接続を確立しようと努める。ついに論理ネットワークを完成させ、暴走するシステムを飼いならし、データ・クリプトの強制解除に成功した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du verwendest viel Zeit darauf, eine Verbindung zwischen den unzähligen Schaltern und Rädern auf dem Bedienfeld und den merkwürdigen Symbolen auf dem defekten Bildschirm herzustellen. Schließlich gelingt es dir, das Logiknetzwerk zu vervollständigen, das tobende System zu beruhigen und es dazu zu zwingen, die Daten-Krypta freizugeben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend a lot of time trying to establish a connection between the countless switches and reels on the control panel and the twisted symbols floating on the glitchy screen. At last you manage to complete the logical network, tame the rampaging system, and force it to disengage the data-crypt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du verwendest viel Zeit darauf, eine Verbindung zwischen den unzähligen Schaltern und Rädern auf dem Bedienfeld und den merkwürdigen Symbolen auf dem defekten Bildschirm herzustellen. Schließlich gelingt es dir, das Logiknetzwerk zu vervollständigen, das tobende System zu beruhigen und es dazu zu zwingen, die Daten-Krypta freizugeben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous passez un certain temps à essayer de comprendre le lien entre les nombreux boutons du panneau de contrôle et les symboles flottant sur l'écran. Vous parvenez finalement à compléter le réseau logique, dompter le système hors de contrôle et le forcer à libérer la crypte de données.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend a lot of time trying to establish a connection between the countless switches and reels on the control panel and the twisted symbols floating on the glitchy screen. At last you manage to complete the logical network, tame the rampaging system, and force it to disengage the data-crypt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous passez un certain temps à essayer de comprendre le lien entre les nombreux boutons du panneau de contrôle et les symboles flottant sur l'écran. Vous parvenez finalement à compléter le réseau logique, dompter le système hors de contrôle et le forcer à libérer la crypte de données.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kontrol panelindeki envaiçeşit düğme ve anahtar ile tekleyen ekranda süzülen habis semboller arasında bağlantı kurmak için epey uğraşıyorsun. Sonunda mantık ağını tamamlayarak zıvanadan çıkmış sistemi kontrol altına alıyor, veri mahzeninden ayrılmaya zorluyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend a lot of time trying to establish a connection between the countless switches and reels on the control panel and the twisted symbols floating on the glitchy screen. At last you manage to complete the logical network, tame the rampaging system, and force it to disengage the data-crypt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kontrol panelindeki envaiçeşit düğme ve anahtar ile tekleyen ekranda süzülen habis semboller arasında bağlantı kurmak için zaman harcıyorsun. Sonunda mantık ağını tamamlayarak zıvanadan çıkmış sistemi kontrol altına alıyor, veri mahzeninden ayrılmaya zorluyorsun.{/n}
